name: PEP the dragon vs the evil zombie Lord Pholon the unicorn and dragons hunter and his sonic super spells of magic fire in HD
name_original: PEP the dragon vs the evil zombie Lord Pholon the unicorn and dragons hunter and his sonic super spells of magic fire in HD
description:
Pep the Dragon had been nominated for GiN Game of the Year in the Best Apple/iOS Game category!!! Jump, run, and blast your way through 10 unique cartoon worlds filled with danger, treasure and magical spells in this classic platforming adventure!
Help PEP the little dragon to rescue his unicorn friend
Sandra from the evil clutches of Lord Pholon.
Tilt (or use on-screen control buttons) to run and tap to jump and explore the magical worlds full of treasures and diamonds.

There are also many different magic spells to collect and use:
Ice line drawing, fireballs, rainbow rays, soap bubbles
and a powerful magic guardian.
Each will enhance your magic powers and help you
defeat Pholon's hordes of aggressive enemies.

FEATURES:

- Classic jump'n'run platforming action
- Beautifully rendered cartoon graphic
environments and characters
- 10 unique worlds to unlock
- 5 magic spells: ice line drawing, fireballs,
rainbow rays, soap bubbles and magic guardian
- 2 control options: BALANCE (tilt device)
or ARCADE (on-screen buttons)
- 12 original music tracks
- High score ranking
- Compatible with iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad
- 4 languages: English, German, Spanish, French
- Game-Center Support
- HD Retina Support + iPhone 5 resolution
